Package org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.bucket.terms

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Terms
    A terms aggregation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTermsParametersParser  
    DoubleTerms  
    DoubleTermsAggregator  
    GlobalOrdinalsStringTermsAggregator
    An aggregator of string values that relies on global ordinals in order to build buckets.
    GlobalOrdinalsStringTermsAggregator.LowCardinality
    Variant of GlobalOrdinalsStringTermsAggregator that resolves global ordinals post segment collection instead of on the fly for each match.This is beneficial for low cardinality fields, because it can reduce the amount of look-ups significantly.
    GlobalOrdinalsStringTermsAggregator.WithHash
    Variant of GlobalOrdinalsStringTermsAggregator that rebases hashes in order to make them dense.
    InternalTerms<A extends InternalTerms,B extends InternalTerms.Bucket>  
    InternalTerms.Bucket  
    LongTerms  
    LongTermsAggregator  
    StringTerms  
    StringTerms.Bucket  
    StringTermsAggregator
    An aggregator of string values.
    Terms.Bucket
    A bucket that is associated with a single term
    Terms.Order
    Determines the order by which the term buckets will be sorted
    TermsAggregator  
    TermsAggregator.BucketCountThresholds

    TermsBuilder
    Builder for the Terms aggregation.
